history:
***history***
Ross Geller: (Neutral) So, um, what do you do for a living?
Kristin: (Neutral) Well, um, for the past few years I've been working.. ...which is funny because, that wasn't even my major.
Carol Willick: (Joyful) Oh no. I thought you said they could shoot the spot without you.
Based on the conversation ***history*** above, as Susan Bunch, please choose the most appropriate emotion among {Mad,Neutral,Joyful,Scared,Sad,Powerful,Peaceful} to respond to the Carol Willick
SourceData: I thought they could...I'll try to get back as soon as I can. I'm sorry.
Coct: Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that, Carol. I know how much you were looking forward to being on set.
FSM: I know, but I had to go in and sign off on it.
